sentences.english: Advanced Aeronautics booster color changes for Apollo and Carrier Drones.
sentences.chinese: 先進航空學將會改變阿波羅和艦載機的加速器顏色。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket between Hong Kong and Sanya on Dragonair.
sentences.chinese: 港龍航空公司來回香港至三亞經濟客位機票乙張。

sentences.english: Thank you for calling Japan Airlines.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您打電話來日本航空公司。

sentences.english: And it introduces the multifunctional aeronautic ground power system as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 對多功能航空地面電源系統做了總體介紹。

sentences.english: Spring Airlines Co. Chairman Wang Zhenghua.
sentences.chinese: 春秋航空有限公司董事長王正華。

sentences.english: How long does it take to send an airmail letter to China?
sentences.chinese: 寄封航空信到中國要多長時間？

sentences.english: The following items are examples of the benefits operators have achieved by using the component removal reduction (CRR) process.
sentences.chinese: 以下內容是使用CRR程序後受益航空公司的實例。

sentences.english: Washington's backing allowed the airlines to expand into cargo and passenger service.
sentences.chinese: 華盛頓的支持讓航空公司拓展到貨物和旅客的服務。

sentences.english: He devoted all his life to the cause of military aviation.
sentences.chinese: 他把一生都獻給了軍用航空事業。

sentences.english: The flow field in low pressure turbine guide vane was simulated by third order accuracy Godunov scheme with TVD property.
sentences.chinese: 求解了某型航空發動機的低壓渦輪導向器內流場。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Bohol via Manila on PR.
sentences.chinese: 宿霧航空公司來回香港至保和經馬尼拉經濟客位機票。

sentences.english: Congress also is looking into the safety of regional airlines that fly the 30- to 90-seat planes.
sentences.chinese: 國會也正在調查區域性航空公司的安全問題。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Xiamen on KA.

sentences.english: He says this will help the industry, but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 他說，油價下降對航空業有好處，但這並不夠。

sentences.english: He sent the letter by air mail, so that it might reach them in good time.
sentences.chinese: 我用航空郵件發出這封信，以便他們及早收到。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Air Cargo Terminals Limited is one of the leading air cargo terminal operators in the world.
sentences.chinese: 香港空運貨站是世界領先的航空貨運站之一。
